text: Rexford "Rex" Trailer (September 16, 1928 - January 9, 2013) was an American actor, singer, cowboy, producer, and television personality who was known for hosting his cowboy television show Boomtown. Trailer was born on September 16, 1928 in Fort Worth, Texas. He was raised in Fort Worth and spent most of his adult life in the Boston, Massachusetts area. He was married to Cindy Trailer from 1955 until her death in 2011. They had one child.
